description: This file defines an Angular standalone component called OceanCardComponent, which renders a styled card with optional header, footer, and content projections. It uses theme tokens for styling and includes metadata, inputs, and template code.

classes.name: OceanCardComponent
classes.description: An Angular component representing a styled card with optional header, footer, and content sections, configurable via inputs and themed styles.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Injects the OCEAN_THEME token to provide theming support. Sets a default theme if none is provided.

search-terms: component with inputs title subtitle hasFooter
